entry.title: $2550 // AAA location - quiet - h/w floors - s/s appliances - Avail: Oct. 1st
entry.content:
This quiet two (2) bedroom apartment is located in AAA, prime location in Astoria

ACTUAL Rent, NO Gimmicks, NO Upsurging & NO Broker's Fee

Heat and hot water included. BIG savings - approx. $125.00 per month

Rent directly from Management

Available: October 1st

Between the N / W and R / M subway lines

Buses are right around the corner on Broadway

Supermarkets, shopping, cafes, organic markets, restaurants, etc. are all within walking distance

Hardwood floors throughout

Stainless steel appliances and granite countertop

Full-time live in super

Qualifications: Minimum annual income (40 X rent) and good / excellent credit report

NO PETS

Please call or text to schedule a private showing (24 hour notice is requires as it is still tenant occupied)
